import React from 'react'; import IncDecInput from "../UI/IncDecInput"; import "./Aside.css" import SimpleInput from "../UI/SimpleInput"; import DropValueInput from "../UI/DropValueInput"; const Aside = ({charList, evalList}) => { return (

); }; export default Aside;
